comments:
-if you refactor/rename any file type from the package explorer, with the properties view also open, an exception is logged

-using Eclipse version 3.2.1

To recreate:
-create a new general project
-open the java package explorer view, if not opened automatically
-add a txt file to that project (using File/New)
-open the properties view, Windows/Show View/Properties
-open the error log view
-select the text file in the package explorer view, right click to refactor/rename, enter a new name
-you get the appended exception
